oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Guy Clark - 2006-09-27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Third of three Artist in Residence performances by Guy Clark from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 27, 2006. Special guests include: Verlon Thompson, Bryn Bright, Shawn Cam, Jamie Hartford, Emmylou Harris.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Guy Clark; Verlon Thompson; Bryn Bright; Shawn Camp; Jamie Hartford; Emmylou Harris;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Opening comments by Liz Thiels. Performances include; Walkin' Man -- Magdalene -- Tornado Time In Texas -- Funny Bone -- Exposé -- Out In The Parkin' Lot -- No Lonesome Tune -- Cinco De Mayo In Memphis -- Analog Girl -- Worry Be Gone -- Diamond Joe (Guy Clark and Verlon Thompson) -- Intermission -- Comments by Jay Orr -- Sis Draper (Shawn Camp) -- Soldier's Joy, 1864 -- Magnolia Wind (Shawn Camp) -- I Don't Love You Much Do I? (Guy Clark and Emmylou Harris) -- Bang The Drum Slowly (Emmylou Harris) -- Old Friends (Guy Clark and Emmylou Harris) -- Joe Walker's Mare (Verlon Thompson) -- Stuff That Works (Jamie Hartford) - Desperados Waiting For A Train (Guy Clark) -- Dublin Blues -- Encore -- Randall Knife (off mic) -- Homegrown Tomatoes (Guy Clark).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Clark, Guy; Thompson, Verlon; Bright, Bryn; Camp, Shawn; Hartford, Jamie; Harris, Emmylou; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
